557ef850-600e-4422-b8e7-fa6866f41dcf.name: 社会污名（少数群体）
557ef850-600e-4422-b8e7-fa6866f41dcf.notes: -2 Reaction from others; +2 Reaction in own group

ad44a9a8-208a-45da-8af6-da999fce9cd3.text: Half-orcs are the offspring of orcs and humans. In most cases, the relationship was not consensual. A halforc can pass for a husky human but is usually unattractive. Their acceptance in orc tribes depends on their strength and ferocity. Humans usually look down on them.
